TabulaRasa.UpdateDef.content:
1.4.8467 - Updated to support 1.4. - Factions are no longer toggled in settings, there's a section of starting a new game dedicated to faction setup, use it instead.
I no longer use this, and haven't for some time, nor Humanoid Alien Races for that matter. So if there's any issues, I won't know unless you tell me in the comments of the mods Steam page.
Right click to dismiss update.
